name: Beat Coaster
description:
Ever feel like the flow of the music is going up and down like a roller coaster? Wanna visualize this through an awesome game? You have come to the right place!

- Numerous well-known 2020 songs to choose from Beat Coaster
- Huge song playlist to choose
- Weekly updated new contents
- Easy to play with simple control
- Spectacular music game experiences
- Play with rhythm and music
- Unique gameplay and relaxation experience
- Summer Hit
- Harder than it looks
Are you ready for the challenge?
